meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1179.

td.p: Pam Browning, a writer originally from West Palm Beach, Florida
Craig Chambers, a manager from Holliston, Massachusetts
Charley Horan, a photographic representative from Manhattan Beach, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,601)

tr.td: THE 1950s
INDIANS
CITIES IN LITERATURE
DOGS
NOBEL PRIZES
TRIVIA
